title: Studio access & supervision
body: Reservations are required for all visits. Access details and any supervised equipment requirements are listed in the portal.

title: Safety & kiln rules
body: Follow posted kiln safety guidance at all times. Pieces must be clearly labeled and submitted according to studio guidelines.

title: Clay & materials policy
body: Approved clay bodies and glaze materials are listed in the portal. Ask before introducing new materials.

title: Firing & scheduling policy
body: Firing requests are submitted through the portal. Turnaround expectations and scheduling windows are listed there.

title: Storage limits & abandoned work
body: Storage limits depend on membership tier. Long-abandoned work may be cleared after notice.

title: Damage & responsibility
body: We handle pieces with care, but firing carries inherent risk. Responsibility and replacement guidelines are listed in the portal.

title: Payment, refunds, and cancellations
body: Payment timing and cancellation windows are published in the portal.

title: Community conduct
body: Respect, safety, and shared space etiquette are required in the studio.
